snippet: Judges at the International Criminal Court in The Hague have given the prosecutor the go-ahead to investigate war crimes in Ivory Coast after the country’s disputed presidential elections last year.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity

lead_paragraph: Judges at the International Criminal Court in The Hague have given the prosecutor the go-ahead to investigate war crimes in Ivory Coast after the country’s disputed presidential elections last year.

headline.main: The Hague: Court Will Investigate War Crimes in Ivory Coast Violence
headline.print_headline: The Hague: Court Will Investigate War Crimes in Ivory Coast Violence
